actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Attorney General to make grants to certain law enforcement officers in reimbursement for costs incurred by such officers in certain legal actions arising out of the performance of official duties.

summary.text: Authorizes the Attorney General to reimburse, for the cost of investigations and legal fees, any law enforcement officer who is a defendant in a civil action arising out of the performance of his official duties and who prevails in such action.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Attorney General to make grants to certain law enforcement officers in reimbursement for costs incurred by such officers in certain legal actions arising out of the performance of official duties.
